articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: All seven tokens to be "permanently" suspended for trading on Bitstamp were earlier classified by the SEC as unregistered securities.
articles.title: Bitstamp to End Trading of Solana, Polygon and 5 Other Altcoins for US Users

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: After SHIB and PEPE, the wider crypto market enjoyed a hefty boost after the Fed issued new clarifications about reigning in the industry.
articles.title: SHIB, PEPE Lead Market Gains as US Fed Launches Crypto Supervision Program

articles.author: Decrypt AI, Edited by Ryan Ozawa
articles.description: In an interview with Wired, the artist says she made more money from the NFTs than from music.
articles.title: Musician Grimes Is 'Pathologically Optimistic' About AI

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: An online safety group says popular AI chatbots can be prompted to glorify unrealistic body images and give dangerous advice.
articles.title: AI Chatbots Promote 'Harmful Eating Disorder Content': Report

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Galaxy Digital CEO Mike Novogratz and Ark Invest CEO Cathie Wood separately expressed optimism that regulatory approval was inevitable.
articles.title: Top Crypto Execs Confident SEC Will Approve Spot Bitcoin ETFs

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: The peer-reviewed, award-winning paper says OpenAI’s ChatGPT leans left as Meta's LLaMA leans right.
articles.title: You’re Not Imagining It: Top AI Chatbots Have Political Biases, Researchers Say

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Traditional finance firms have previously been dinged for crypto exposure.
articles.title: Moody's Bearish Bank Ratings Could Presage Another Volatile Season

articles.description: From million-dollar superchips to high-powered gaming GPUs, Nvidia announced a variety of new offerings well suited for artificial intelligence.
articles.title: Nvidia Teases New Hardware, Software, and Services for AI

articles.author: Kate Irwin,Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The publishers behind massive hits like Final Fantasy, Assassin's Creed, Madden, and FIFA are playing in the NFT gaming space.
articles.title: From Square Enix to Ubisoft: The Biggest Publishers Building NFT Games

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Amazon removed several books believed to be written using AI and listed under a real author’s name.
articles.title: Amazon Reverses Course on ‘Garbage Books’ After Public Uproar

articles.author: Ryan Gladwin
articles.description: Looking to gain an edge in Mojo Melee, the approachable auto battler game with NFTs? These key tips will help you rule the online battlefield.
articles.title: 'Mojo Melee' Beginner's Guide: How to Dominate in the NFT Auto Battler

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Prosecutors had dropped a campaign finance charge against SBF back in July.
articles.title: Feds Still Plan to Charge Sam Bankman-Fried With Campaign Finance Violations

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk's attorneys filed a motion to have a Dogecoin insider trading class-action lawsuit dismissed... again.
articles.title: Elon Musk's 'Silly' Dogecoin Tweets Are Dragging Out Insider Trading Lawsuit, Lawyers Say

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The message came in a prelude to an upcoming homily, “Artificial Intelligence and Peace,” for World Peace Day on September 21.
articles.title: AI Is Even Making the Pope Nervous

articles.author: Mattis Meichler
articles.description: Base is integrates Chainlink's price feeds to simplify integrating popular DeFi applications on the new blockchain.
articles.title: Coinbase Layer-2 Chain Base Taps Chainlink Ahead of Mainnet Launch

articles.description: An estimated 60% of recording artists have already used AI technology in creating works.
articles.title: Famous Pop Stars and Their Views on Music AI, from Grimes to Drake

articles.description: Backed Finance has integrated Chainlink’s price feeds, onboarding a suite of tokenized assets to six different blockchains.
articles.title: Tokenized Coinbase Stocks Are Coming to Polygon Thanks to Backed Finance

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: The industry's largest exchange Binance has secured two licenses for conducting crypto-related business in El Salvador.
articles.title: Binance Secures Crypto Exchange License in El Salvador

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Coinbase has commenced an offer to buy for cash up to $150 million of its outstanding 3.625% senior notes due 2031.
articles.title: Coinbase to Buy Back up to $150M in Own Corporate Bonds

articles.author: Mattis Meichler,Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Kenyan officials raided a Worldcoin warehouse last week, reportedly claiming it failed to disclose its intentions when it registered in Kenya.
articles.title: Kenyan Authorities Raided a Worldcoin Warehouse Last Week

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: Network statistics show that XRP is losing its bullish momentum following last month’s court ruling in the token's securities case.
articles.title: XRP Price Falls 10% on the Week as Bullish SEC Hype Fades

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: The reported lack of traction in the United States hasn't slowed Circle's CEO from lobbying in Washington however.
articles.title: Circle CEO Says Just 30% of USDC Adoption Occurs in US

articles.author: Mattis Meichler
articles.description: The founder of Superchief Gallery is on a mission to connect a global network of 50 physical NFT galleries. First up? IHAM Gallery in Paris.
articles.title: Borderless Art Comes to Life With Superchief's Network of NFT Galleries

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Journalist Jane Friedman says her name is being used to sell books written with AI on Amazon, prompting concerns over author verification.
articles.title: Amazon Won't Remove Books Listed Under a Real Author's Name But Allegedly Written With AI

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: You'll have to opt-out if you don't want your online content used for AI training.
articles.title: OpenAI to Unleash New Web Crawler to Devour More of the Open Web

articles.author: Portal do Bitcoin
articles.description: Although only a few financial institutions can handle DREX, its implementation is expected to help Brazilians access more banking products.
articles.title: Central Bank of Brazil Reveals Name of Its Controversial CBDC

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The biotechnology firm obtained significant financial support for its brain-computer interface development from Peter Thiel’s Founders Fund.
articles.title: Elon Musk-Backed Brain Hacking Firm Neuralink Raises $280 Million

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: From BlackRock-level excitement to a total “nothingburger,” reactions to PayPal's stablecoin are mixed—but it's got the whole industry talking.
articles.title: PayPal PYUSD Stablecoin Could Breed Competition and Force Regulators to Act

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: World of Neopia CEO Dominic Law told Decrypt that the game studio has “scarce resources” despite raising $4 million earlier this year.
articles.title: Neopets Fans ‘Care Less’ About Crypto, CEO Says

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The announcement of PayPal's PYUSD has sparked a wave of imposter tokens on Uniswap, exploiting the hype.
articles.title: PayPal Stablecoin Fakes Flood Ethereum—Here's How to Find the Real One

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: Forget surreptitiously installed keyloggers—your keyboard can give away what you’re writing through the sounds it makes.
articles.title: AI Can Tell What You Type By Listening to Your Keystrokes

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Reddit users are rewarded with the tokens based on engagement.
articles.title: Reddit Moons and Bricks Soar After Kraken Listing

articles.description: "I wrote them off," Twitch streamer Alliestrasza said of her initial thoughts on many early blockchain games. She tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how her perspective on Web3 games has evolved over time and now sees blockchain games getting significantly better.
articles.title: Many Early Blockchain Games Were 'Cash Grabs,' Says Twitch Streamer Alliestrasza

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: Crypto funds are still taking profits, with the latest CoinShares report revealing the biggest weekly sell-off since March this year.
articles.title: Investors Have Stopped Shorting Bitcoin for First Time in 3 Months, Says CoinShares

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: PayPal announced today the launch of a native dollar-pegged stablecoin backed by cash equivalents and short-term treasuries.
articles.title: Payments Giant PayPal to Launch Dollar-Pegged Stablecoin on Ethereum

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: On-chain data shows Bitcoin long-term holders now hold 14.599 million BTC, the highest value the metric has ever seen.
articles.title: Long-Term Bitcoin Holder Metric Hits New All-Time High

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: The amount of DAI minted and deposited back into the Maker protocol has surged dramatically since the latest upgrade.
articles.title: Stablecoin Deposits on Maker Soar as DAI Interest Rates Hit 8%

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: The Curve bounty sits at 10% of the stolen funds, roughly $1.85 million, and was announced via an on-chain Ethereum message.
articles.title: $1.8M Bounty Now Open to Public as Curve Finance Hacker Misses Deadline

articles.author: Nathan Reiff
articles.description: In such a turbulent world dominated by strong personalities and potentially large sums of speculative cash flying around, it’s perhaps to be expected that high-profile feuds and fights will develop.
articles.title: Zuck v. Musk and Other Famous Feuds in Web3 History

articles.description: MetalCore is an upcoming mech shooter developed by Studio 369, and it's being developed on Ethereum scaling network Immutable zkEVM. Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin played through the prologue and tested out the recent Alpha 3 online experience to get a sense of the NFT-infused mash-up of Titanfall and Destiny.
articles.title: 'MetalCore' Game Preview: Hands-on With the 'Titanfall' Meets 'Destiny' NFT Mash-Up

articles.description: Aurory is an NFT-driven game franchise that started life on Solana and is expanding to other chains. Decrypt's Jason Nelson spoke with Aurory Head of Marketing Michael Natoli at Solana's PlayGG event, where Natoli shared his thoughts on the challenges that blockchain games face in reaching players.
articles.title: 'Give Projects a Chance,' Says Aurory's Michael Natoli on NFT Game Challenges

articles.description: Solana Foundation General Manager Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how the Solana network will tackle the scaling problem that blockchain games pose for the industry.
articles.title: Solana Is Only Network Ready for Gaming: Solana Foundation's Johnny Lee

articles.description: Kyu Lee is the President of game studio Com2uS USA. In an interview, he shares the studio's approach to Web3 and crypto gaming with Decrypt GG's Kate Irwin.
articles.title: Com2uS Is Going "Full Speed" on Crypto Gaming: Kyu Lee

articles.description: Decrypt's Jason Nelson interviews Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos Creative Director Alex Finden at the Solana PlayGG event in San Diego, California.
articles.title: Building a Discord Game with AI and Blockchain: 'Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos' Creative Lead Alex Finden

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: CEO of the dYdX Foundation Charles d'Haussy unpacks the decision behind moving one of the largest decentralized exchange protocol's over to its very own chain built on Cosmos. A key driver, he told Decrypt at this year's EthCC event, was that instead of launching on a rollup or another layer-1, launching a fully customized chain will allow dYdX to fine tune the network for its product's needs.
articles.title: 'Big Respect Between Ethereum and Cosmos Developer Communities': dYdX Foundation CEO

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Marin Tvrdić, a business development contributor to the Lido DAO, sat down with Decrypt during this year's EthCC to break down how the liquid staking protocol has managed such a massive lead, how it plans to keep that lead, and the protocol's new dual-governance tokenomics.
articles.title: Ethereum Staking Solution Lido 'Had Perfect Product Market Fit' at Launch, Says DAO's Biz Dev Contributor

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: OpenZeppelin's security solutions architect Michael Lewellen sat down with Decrypt to discuss how the industry can become a little safer for users at this year's EthCC Paris. The key? Introducing security standards across the industry so folks know what an audit actually means and where risks lie, be it bad faith actors or poor implementation.
articles.title: What's Going to Stop All the DeFi Hacks? 'Standards,' Says OpenZepplin Security Architect

articles.description: Ev.io is a web-based first-person shooter that's free to play, but lets NFT holders earn in-game currency that can be redeemed for Solana (SOL). Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin shares his review of the fun throwback to Quake-style blasting, albeit with a modern crypto twist.
articles.title: 'Ev.io' Game Review: Earn Solana While Blasting Enemies

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Account abstraction this, smart wallets that. Discussions at EthCC Paris about improving user experience have pointed at industry leader MetaMask as an example of what not to do. But that may soon change, with a host of updates and optimizations coming to crypto's number one wallet, said its product lead Alex Jupiter. It still may take some time, though, before these changes take effect.
articles.title: 'Moving Fast and Breaking Things Isn't the Web3 Ethos': MetaMask Product Lead

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Argent co-founder Julien Niset told Decrypt at EthCC Paris that he wants to make crypto wallets disappear. Or at least how they're currently conceived. From clunky seed phrases to a stiff user experience, Argent hopes to make using crypto a little less intimidating and a whole lot more fun.
articles.title: Scaling Smart Wallets on Starknet 'Was The Winning Combination', Says Argent Co-Founder

articles.description: Mighty Action Heroes is the flagship blockchain title from Mighty Bear Games. But is the browser-based battle royale shooter worth checking out? Decrypt's Kate Irwin offers her thoughts and a first look at the upcoming game.
articles.title: Inside Mighty Action Heroes' Open Beta

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin playtests Dr. Disrespect and Midnight Society's first-person shooter Deadrop and shares the latest game updates, as well as her opinions on the game in development. Currently, Deadrop offers Polygon Founders Pass NFTs with no other crypto plans revealed just yet.
articles.title: Dr. Disrespect's 'Deadrop': Early Access Gameplay From Snapshot VI

articles.description: In the wake of EA Sports and Fortnite creator Epic Games embracing Nike's NFT platform, Mythical Games CEO John Linden tells Decrypt's Andrew Hayward how quickly he expects to see more major traditional game publishers enter the blockchain space and how quickly the industry will scale.
articles.title: 'More and More' Game Publishers Will Embrace NFTs: Mythical Games CEO

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin plays Gran Saga: Unlimited's second community playtest, reports her findings, and offers her opinion and insights on the upcoming game, which will offer optional Aptos NFTs.
articles.title: Gran Saga Unlimited Early Access: Inside the Anime MMORPG on Aptos
